Chinese.name: kafka消息上传到cos
Chinese.description: 本示例通过配置kafka触发器，从kafka接收到消息后，写入文件并上传到cos中
Chinese.attention: 需要配置kafka触发器，并在cos中创建一个bucket

author.name: 腾讯云无服务器云函数团队

English.name: KafkaMsg_To_Cos
English.description: This function will collect message from ckafka, then upload it to cos
English.attention: You need to config ckafka trigger and create your bucket in cos
